Name: Base of a statuette of Ramesses II
Description: The rectangular base with two holes for fixing a statuette. According to the inscriptions placed on the right (1) and left (2) sides of the base, the statuette represented Ramesses II. The inscriptions read: (1) "Usermaatre-Setepenre, Son of Re, Ramesses-Meriamun", (2) "--- Son of Re, Ramesses-Meriamun".
